text: Kananjalo isibhengezo esivela kuAllâh noMthunywa waKhe ebantwini ngowona mhla mkhulu1 sesokuba uAllâh Ukhululekile kwiimbophelelo ezimayela nabakhonzi bezithixo, ukwanjalo noMthunywa waKhe. Ukuba ke nina bakhonzi bezithixo niyaguquka, kolunga (oko) kuni, kodwa ukuba niyajibilika, yazini kakuhle okokuba anisokuze niphuncule kuAllâh. Ke kaloku (Muhammad) nika iindaba ezivuyisayo zesohlwayo esibuhlungu kwabo bangakholwayo
